thread.title: Mainstay Medical nets €14.5mm in IPO in France and Ireland
thread.title_full: Mainstay Medical nets €14.5mm in IPO in France and Ireland

title: Mainstay Medical nets €14.5mm in IPO in France and Ireland
text:
Mainstay Medical nets €14.5mm in IPO in France and Ireland Deal Date: Apr-01-2014 / Deal # 201430837 Executive Summary 
Pain device developer Mainstay Medical International PLC netted €14.5mm ($20.1mm) in its initial public offering of 851k new ordinary shares for €21.15. The company offered the shares in a public offering in France and via a private placement to international institutional investors. Its stock is now listed in Euronext Paris and the Enterprise Securities Market of the Irish Stock Exchange.
